hotels.name: Deplar Farm
hotels.desc: Luxury farm lodge, world-class spa, exclusive activities, stunning natural setting
hotels.longDesc: An exceptionally luxurious farm resort in remote Iceland offering bespoke experiences, elite accommodations, and a spa of unparalleled quality, all set within breathtaking landscapes that redefine luxury hospitality.

hotels.name: Black Sand Hotel
hotels.desc: Landscape-inspired design hotel, tranquility focus, character-driven experiences
hotels.longDesc: An Icelandic design hotel that prioritizes tranquility and landscape integration. Emphasizes character and cultural authenticity over mainstream luxury trends.

hotels.name: Eleven Degrees Plar Farm
hotels.desc: Icelandic farm stay on Troll Peninsula, epic winter landscapes, authentic charm
hotels.longDesc: An authentic Icelandic farm experience on the dramatic Troll Peninsula, surrounded by epic winter landscapes and pristine natural beauty.

hotels.name: Retreat at Blue Lagoon
hotels.desc: Private geothermal lagoon with waters from the same source as the famed Blue Lagoon
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive retreat offering a private geothermal lagoon fed by the same mineral-rich waters as Iceland's iconic Blue Lagoon, providing an intimate thermal bathing experience.

hotels.name: Kerlingarfjoll Highland Base
hotels.desc: Highland mountain base, geothermal setting, alpine retreat
hotels.longDesc: A mountain retreat based in Iceland's highlands, offering access to dramatic geothermal landscapes and immersive alpine experiences at significant elevation.

hotels.name: ION Adventure Hotel, Nesjavellir, a Member of Design Hotels
hotels.desc: Ultra-modern luxury hotel, geothermal heated pool, stunning golden circle views
hotels.longDesc: This architectural marvel offers families a unique stay with geothermal amenities and easy access to Iceland's most famous attractions. Perfect for combining comfort with adventure.

hotels.name: Efstidalur II
hotels.desc: Working farm stay, homemade ice cream, family rooms, authentic Icelandic experience
hotels.longDesc: Stay on an active dairy farm where children can interact with animals and enjoy fresh, homemade treats. A memorable way to experience rural Icelandic life as a family.

restaurants.name: On-site Restaurant at Laugavara Lagoon
restaurants.desc: Farm-to-table fine dining with locally foraged ingredients and seasonal menu from chef GÃ­sli Matt
restaurants.longDesc: An on-site restaurant featuring chef GÃ­sli Matt's seasonal cuisine crafted from locally foraged ingredients and produce sourced from neighboring farms, perfectly complementing the wellness experience.

restaurants.name: Dill Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Nordic fine dining, locally sourced ingredients, seasonal tasting menus, intimate setting
restaurants.longDesc: Award-winning restaurant celebrating Icelandic ingredients with creative, artistic presentations. An unforgettable dinner experience for families seeking culinary adventure.

restaurants.name: Icelandic Street Food
restaurants.desc: Casual eatery, traditional Icelandic fast food, lamb hot dogs, rye bread, quick service
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved local spot serving authentic Icelandic street food in a relaxed atmosphere. Perfect for families wanting to taste traditional flavors without a long commitment.

restaurants.desc: Cozy cafÃ© in Selfoss serving sandwiches, soups, and traditional Icelandic dishes

restaurants.name: Drangar Restaurant

experiences.name: Laugavara Lagoon
experiences.desc: Geothermal pools with cascading waterfall, locally-sourced dining, hot springs and rugged natural beauty
experiences.longDesc: Iceland's newest wellness destination combines geothermal pools linked by a cascading waterfall with seasonal cuisine from chef GÃ­sli Matt, showcasing locally foraged ingredients and farm produce.

experiences.name: JÃ¶kulsÃ¡rlÃ³
experiences.desc: Iconic glacier lagoon, ice formations, breathtaking natural landscapes
experiences.longDesc: Iceland's most captivating glacial landscape features a pristine lagoon surrounded by massive icebergs and dramatic ice formations, creating unforgettable photographic moments.

experiences.name: Perlan
experiences.desc: Dome building, rotating observation deck, museums, planetarium, interactive exhibits
experiences.longDesc: This iconic landmark combines stunning 360-degree city views with fascinating museums about Iceland's nature and culture. An engaging, all-weather destination for curious families.

experiences.name: Arctic Adventures Silfra Fissure
experiences.desc: Swim between tectonic plates, crystal clear water, unique geology, guided tours available
experiences.longDesc: Float between two continental plates in the world's clearest freshwater rift. A thrilling, once-in-a-lifetime adventure that older children and adults will treasure forever.

experiences.name: Thingvellir National Park
experiences.desc: UNESCO World Heritage site where tectonic plates meet with dramatic rift valley

experiences.name: Geysir Hot Springs
experiences.desc: Active geysers and bubbling hot springs perfect for kids to watch

experiences.name: Gullfoss Falls
experiences.desc: Iceland's most iconic golden waterfall with accessible viewing platforms

experiences.name: Diamond Beach
experiences.desc: Ice chunks on black sand beach across from glacier lagoon

experiences.name: SkÃ³gafoss
experiences.desc: Powerful 60-meter waterfall you can walk right up to

kidFriendly.name: Asatru Temple
kidFriendly.desc: Nordic heritage center, interactive exhibits, family-friendly cultural activities, gift shop
kidFriendly.longDesc: Explore Iceland's ancient Viking heritage through engaging exhibits and activities. Children enjoy hands-on learning about Norse culture, mythology, and traditional crafts.

kidFriendly.name: SkÃ³gar Museum
kidFriendly.desc: Open-air museum with turf houses and farm animals

markets.name: Hlemmur MathÃ¶ll
markets.desc: Artisan market, local designers, handcrafted goods, Icelandic souvenirs, quality wares
markets.longDesc: A vibrant market celebrating Icelandic artisans and designers. Families can browse unique handmade items, from jewelry to textiles, while discovering authentic local talent and creativity.

a.name: Iceland's Golden Circle & Glacier Lagoon Adventure (8 Days)
a.description: A family-friendly journey through Iceland's most spectacular natural wonders, from geothermal lagoons and cascading waterfalls to glacier ice formations and cozy farm stays, perfectly paced for young explorers.
